医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用先进设备缩小儿科心脏护理方面的差距奥克斯纳儿童医院 (Ochsner Children's Hospital) 在儿科心脏病学和先天性心脏手术方面位居全国顶级医院之列，该医院正在提高人们对更多儿科专用心脏设备需求的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Bridging-the-gap-in-pediatric-heart-care-with-advanced-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Bridging-the-gap-in-pediatric-heart-care-with-advanced-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94315654-19cc-4178-a4e2-20191468873f Tue, 20 Feb 2024 21:16:04 -0500 Bridging the gap in pediatric heart care with advanced devices
大脑功能变化与抑郁症暴露有关研究表明，抑郁症的暴露与大脑功能的显着变化相关，这种变化因抑郁症的定义而异，但没有显着的结构差异，强调需要精确的诊断标准来提高治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Functional-brain-changes-linked-to-depression-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Functional-brain-changes-linked-to-depression-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0ff689d-b32d-4410-9d42-a9298e334d20 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 21:09:00 -0500 Functional brain changes linked to depression exposure
微笑让人们更有可能从面无表情的脸上看到幸福埃塞克斯大学的新研究表明，微笑一秒钟会让人们更有可能在面无表情的脸上看到幸福。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Smiling-makes-people-more-likely-to-see-happiness-in-expressless-faces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Smiling-makes-people-more-likely-to-see-happiness-in-expressless-faces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc50a59-6b87-4393-b569-2126e6711b2d Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:50:52 -0500 Smiling makes people more likely to see happiness in expressionless faces
揭示柳氮磺吡啶对 IBD-SpA 患者的作用机制尽管它是用于治疗炎症性肠病 (IBD) 患者的最古老的药物之一，也是治疗脊柱关节炎 (SpA) 相关关节炎疾病的有效方法，但柳氮磺吡啶的作用机制尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unlocking-sulfasalazines-mechanism-of-action-in-IBD-SpA-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unlocking-sulfasalazines-mechanism-of-action-in-IBD-SpA-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=554f59e6-657a-4c5c-9439-6c09f07b2f83 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:38:00 -0500 Unlocking sulfasalazine's mechanism of action in IBD-SpA patients
“实验室睾丸”可以解决男性不育之谜睾丸负责精子的产生和睾酮的合成。睾丸发育和功能异常会导致性发育障碍（DSD）和男性不育。目前，尚不存在用于睾丸建模的体外系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/e2809cLaboratory-testiclese2809d-could-solve-male-infertility-mysteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/e2809cLaboratory-testiclese2809d-could-solve-male-infertility-mysteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58b30569-e1ff-43bb-981c-40517a57df3f Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:33:05 -0500 “Laboratory testicles” could solve male infertility mysteries
历史 DNA 分析鉴定出古代人类患有唐氏综合症和爱德华氏综合症通过分析古代 DNA，一个国际研究小组发现了染色体疾病的病例，其中包括可能是从史前遗骸中发现的第一例爱德华兹综合症病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Historic-DNA-analysis-identizes-Down-and-Edwards-syndromes-in-ancient- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Historic-DNA-analysis-identizes-Down-and-Edwards-syndromes-in-ancient- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4afbc02f-568a-442d-97f1-3f5007f55782 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:26:36 -0500 Historic DNA analysis identifies Down and Edwards syndromes in ancient humans
衰老改变成纤维细胞促进胰腺癌生长约翰·霍普金斯大学金梅尔癌症中心和约翰·霍普金斯大学布隆伯格公立学院的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，由于胰腺中称为成纤维细胞的细胞发生与年龄相关的变化，老年人患胰腺癌的风险可能更大，并且预后较差。健康与彭博~金梅尔癌症免疫治疗研究所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Aging-alters-fabricblasts-to-promote-pancreatic-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Aging-alters-fabricblasts-to-promote-pancreatic-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4884e2f5-5448-4138-a686-030d79d4fc3f Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:19:01 -0500 Aging alters fibroblasts to promote pancreatic cancer growth
研究揭示了卵母细胞长寿的新机制卵母细胞是几乎所有雌性哺乳动物在出生前发育的未成熟卵细胞。后代的繁殖取决于细胞的有限储备，能够存活多年而不会受到损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-novel-mechanism-for-longevity-of-otherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-reveals-novel-mechanism-for-longevity-of-otherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ea75bbb-15ba-4bba-a6e8-6f15d0bf6829 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:18:15 -0500 Study reveals novel mechanism for longevity of oocytes
石墨烯生物传感器可准确评估肉类新鲜度动物肉的新鲜度是决定其质量和安全性的重要特性。凭借能够长时间保存食物的先进技术，肉类可以运往全球各地，并在动物死亡后很长时间内食用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Graphene-biosensor-offers-accurate-assessment-of-meat-freshness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Graphene-biosensor-offers-accurate-assessment-of-meat-freshness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80052e19-aad8-46b1-8f8a-7aee19930e23 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:10:37 -0500 Graphene biosensor offers accurate assessment of meat freshness
研究评估拉丁美洲的结直肠癌筛查计划除美国和加拿大外，整个西半球对结直肠癌筛查策略知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-evaluates-colorectal-cancer-screening-programs-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-evaluates-colorectal-cancer-screening-programs-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bafd020-f724-447d-ac42-e81b353114a7 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 13:06:34 -0500 Study evaluates colorectal cancer screening programs in Latin America
